About me

Hi! I'm Pontus from Sundsvall, Sweden. I am a tech-savvy entrepreneur and music lover. With a robust background in full-stack web development, I've honed skills in HTML, CSS, and Java. Beyond coding, my passion for music inspired VernFM, a unique music platform I created.

Currently studying Information Technology at NTI Gymnasiet, I've also gained industry insights interning at Osynlig AB. Excited about innovations and collaborations, feel free to contact me!

Hello! My name is Pontus, an aspiring entrepreneur, tech enthusiast, and music advocate based in Sundsvall, Sweden. I am passionate about creating innovative solutions using technology and committed to bringing new ideas to life.

My journey in the tech world started as a self-taught coder. Since then, I have cultivated a diverse skill set in web development, including languages such as HTML, CSS, and Java. I enjoy diving into new challenges and learning new technologies. As a full-stack developer, I have a keen understanding of both the frontend and backend aspects of web development, allowing me to deliver a comprehensive and effective solution.

I'm not just about code, though. I am a firm believer in the power of music and its ability to inspire and create connections. This passion led me to create VernFM - a music platform with new original features.

At VernFM, my responsibilities include overseeing all aspects of the project, from development and design to marketing and management. It's an opportunity to blend my love for technology and music in a meaningful way.

I've been fortunate enough to gain hands-on experience in the tech industry through internships. My most recent internship was at Osynlig AB, where I was exposed to the operations of a development company and enhanced my technical skills.

Currently, I am a student at NTI Gymnasiet, where I am studying "Information Technology". When I'm not studying or coding, you can find me engaging with the latest innovations in the tech world.

I am always open to new opportunities and projects where I can apply my skills and learn new ones. If you're interested in connecting or discussing any potential collaboration, feel free to reach out!

My skills

Armed with a versatile skill set, I excel in both web development and design. My expertise ranges from JavaScript, Java, and web tech like HTML and CSS, to backend tools like PHP. With proficiency in design tools like Figma and collaborative tools like Git & Github, I ensure top-notch, collaborative work. Dive in to explore my diverse capabilities!

JavaScript Java HTML CSS SASS/SCSS
PHP C/C++ Figma Python Git & Github

Projects i worked on

Dropletstore

I am the co-founder and CEO of Dropletstore, a web outlet e-commerce store where we sell items that I have personally designed.

Visit Website

ZippiUX

I am the founder and CEO of ZippiUX which is a comprehensive web services team dedicated to assisting clients with their online needs. Our services encompass SEO, web development, web design, and content writing, all offered at affordable rates.

Visit Website

VernFM

I am the founder and CEO of VernFM which is a contemporary music platform tailored to simplify both music listening and publishing. Serving as an ideal launchpad for emerging artists and a growth platform for established ones, it offers a broad spectrum of entertainment from songs and podcasts to music videos. As the founder and sole proprietor of this venture, I take immense pride in what VernFM brings to the music community.

Visit Website

Lotus

I am the co-founder and CEO of Lotus, a type-safe compiled programming language designed to simplify the syntax of C++ and achieve memory safety using ownership and borrowing. Lotus seamlessly blends the unrivaled efficiency of C and C++ with the elegant simplicity of Python, offering coders the best of both worlds. The syntax of Lotus is mainly C/C++ based however adding new features and "syntactic-sugar". The goal of the language is a more elegant approach to high-demand programming. I am deeply committed to bridging the gap between high-performance computing and user-friendly scripting. Whether you're an expert looking to enhance your coding prowess or a newcomer aspiring to embark on your programming journey, Lotus stands as your premier choice.

Visit Website
